form.official-title: To extend authority relating to roving surveillance, access to business records, and individual terrorists as agents of foreign powers under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 and for other purposes.

section.header: Extensions of authority under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978

subsection.header: Roving surveillance and access to business records
subsection.text: Section 102(b)(1) of the USA PATRIOT Improvement and Reauthorization Act of 2005 (50 U.S.C. 1805 note) is amended by striking June 1, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2020.

subsection.header: Individual terrorists as agents of foreign powers
subsection.text: Section 6001(b)(1) of the Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004 (50 U.S.C. 1801 note) is amended by striking June 1, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2020.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
